
{{alias}}( x )
    Evaluates the signum function.

    Table of results:

    Value   | Sign
    ------- | -----
    `x > 0` | `+1`
    `x < 0` | `-1`
    `0`     | `0`
    `-0`    | `-0`
    `NaN`   | `NaN`

    Parameters
    ----------
    x: double
        Input value.

    Returns
    -------
    sign: double
        Function value.

    Examples
    --------
    > var sign = {{alias}}( -5.0 )
    -1.0
    > sign = {{alias}}( 5.0 )
    1.0
    > sign = {{alias}}( -0.0 )
    -0.0
    > sign = {{alias}}( 0.0 )
    0.0
    > sign = {{alias}}( NaN )
    NaN

    See Also
    --------
